fields.title: Hello World!
fields.text: This is the first post and it's not very long.

fields.title: Two posts are better than one
fields.text:
Gehe auf Posts und experimentiere ein bisschen damit. Füge fünf oder sechs Blogeinträge hinzu. Mach dir keine Sorgen wegen des Inhalts -- der ist nur auf deinem lokalen Computer sichtbar. Um Zeit zu sparen kannst du etwas Text aus diesem Tutorial kopieren und einfügen. :-)

Achte darauf, dass bei wenigstens zwei oder drei Posts (aber nicht bei allen) das Veröffentlichungsdatum (publish date) eingetragen ist. Das werden wir später noch brauchen.

fields.title: I am the superuser
fields.text: Wenn du dazu aufgefordert wirst, gib einen Benutzernamen (Kleinbuchstaben, keine Leerzeichen), eine Mailadresse und ein Passwort ein. Mach dir keine Gedanken, wenn du das Passwort bei der Eingabe nicht sehen kannst - so soll es sein. Tippe weiter und drücke Enter, um weiterzumachen. Du solltest nun Folgendes sehen (wobei Benutzername und Email deine eigenen sein sollten):

fields.title: Syndicate interactive e-business
fields.text:
Look around, look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere, you only have to look to see it. Little trees and bushes grow however makes them happy. You can do anything here. So don't worry about it. Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything. If what you're doing doesn't make you happy - you're doing the wrong thing. We want to use a lot pressure while using no pressure at all.

When you buy that first tube of paint it gives you an artist license. There is immense joy in just watching - watching all the little creatures in nature. The first step to doing anything is to believe you can do it. See it finished in your mind before you ever start. We have no limits to our world. We're only limited by our imagination. A thin paint will stick to a thick paint. La- da- da- da- dah. Just be happy.

Let's build some happy little clouds up here. In painting, you have unlimited power. You have the ability to move mountains. A happy cloud. Isn't that fantastic? And right there you got an almighty cloud.

Volunteering your time; it pays you and your whole community fantastic dividends. It's a super day, so why not make a beautiful sky? We have all at one time or another mixed some mud. We'll throw some old gray clouds in here just sneaking around and having fun. Isn't that fantastic that you can create an almighty tree that fast? Of course he's a happy little stone, cause we don't have any other kind.

There isn't a rule. You just practice and find out which way works best for you. Very easy to work these to death. Fluff it up a little and hypnotize it.

fields.title: Target mission-critical portals
fields.text:
We artists are a different breed of people. We're a happy bunch. Decide where your cloud lives. Maybe he lives right in here. At home you have unlimited time. It's a good way of getting rid of all your anxieties and hostilities. Let all these little things happen. Don't fight them. Learn to use them.

Painting should do one thing. It should put happiness in your heart. As trees get older they lose their chlorophyll. There he comes. Don't be bashful drop me a line.

Now then, let's play. With something so strong, a little bit can go a long way. Here's something that's fun. Automatically, all of these beautiful, beautiful things will happen. Almost everything is going to happen for you automatically - you don't have to spend any time working or worrying.

The only prerequisite is that it makes you happy. If it makes you happy then it's good. That's crazy. This is the way you take out your flustrations.

You don't have to be crazy to do this but it does help. No worries. No cares. Just float and wait for the wind to blow you around. Exercising the imagination, experimenting with talents, being creative; these things, to me, are truly the windows to your soul. There it is.

This is your world. Be careful. You can always add more - but you can't take it away. You're meant to have fun in life. Tree trunks grow however makes them happy. We're trying to teach you a technique here and how to use it.

Now, we're going to fluff this cloud. We have no limits to our world. We're only limited by our imagination. That is when you can experience true joy, when you have no fear. We don't have to be concerned about it. We just have to let it fall where it will. We have all at one time or another mixed some mud.

fields.title: Synthesize open-source infrastructures
fields.text:
Poor old tree. By now you should be quite happy about what's happening here. You don't have to be crazy to do this but it does help. Let's put some happy trees and bushes back in here. Trees cover up a multitude of sins. Just go out and talk to a tree. Make friends with it.

We'll paint one happy little tree right here. I started painting as a hobby when I was little. I didn't know I had any talent. I believe talent is just a pursued interest. Anybody can do what I do. Let that brush dance around there and play. Follow the lay of the land. It's most important.

Let's have a happy little tree in here. Only think about one thing at a time. Don't get greedy. In life you need colors. Put your feelings into it, your heart, it's your world. These trees are so much fun. I get started on them and I have a hard time stopping. Clouds are free. They just float around the sky all day and have fun.

Give him a friend, we forget the trees get lonely too. Just go back and put one little more happy tree in there. That's what makes life fun. That you can make these decisions. That you can create the world that you want.

We don't really know where this goes - and I'm not sure we really care. And maybe, maybe, maybe... Maybe there's a little something happening right here.

Trees grow however makes them happy. All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind. Let's make some happy little clouds in our world. Don't be afraid to make these big decisions. Once you start, they sort of just make themselves.

We spend so much of our life looking - but never seeing. The more we do this - the more it will do good things to our heart. A happy cloud. Just beat the devil out of it. This present moment is perfect simply due to the fact you're experiencing it.
